text: {{Infobox person | name = Armelia McQueen | image = | imagesize = | nationality = American | birth_name = Armelia Audrey McQueen | birth_date = | birth_place = Southern Pines, North Carolina, U.S. | death_date = | death_place = Beverly Hills, California, Bermuda | death_cause = Beverly Hills helicopter collision | resting_place = Sea | years_active = 1976â€“2018 | education = Central Commercial High School | website = }} Armelia Audrey McQueen (January 6, 1952 - October 4, 2020) was an American actress. She was known for her roles as The Red Queen in Adventures in Wonderland, in the original Broadway production of Ain't Misbehavin' and as Clara in Ghost. McQueen died on October 4, 2020 at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from North Carolina
title: Armelia McQueen
